project_momitos_description:
Web platform designed to showcase and manage the handmade products of Momitos Handmade, a handcrafted textile creation project. Full Stack Development: HTML - CSS (layout and visual design) / JavaScript (front-end interactivity and animations) / PHP (back-end dynamic product management) / MySQL (database) / InfinityFree (free hosting).

Includes a product catalog organized by categories, individual dynamic carousels, a modal with an image gallery, an automatic design availability counter, and external purchase links. It also allows product management through an admin role from the database and offers a functional form to request custom orders, as well as direct access to social media.
project_orientait_description:
Web platform designed to meet the needs of companies and candidates in the IT sector. Full Stack Development: HTML - CSS (layout - design) / JavaScript (front-end) / PHP (back-end) / Bootstrap (framework) / MySQL (database) / InfinityFree (free hosting).

It features responsive design, registration/login validation, user-role functionality (candidate / company / admin), job posting and management, job applications, search filters, CV uploads, and career guidance resources, as well as scheduled appointments with the admin.
